translations.translation: the Companions of the Left: what of the Companions of the Left?
Then those of the left hand -- how (unhappy) will be those of the left hand!
And the People on the Left: and how miserable will be the People on the Left!
The people of the left hand - those whose books of records will be placed in their left hands. How miserable they will be!
And those on the left – how (wretched) are those on the left!
And those on the left -- how (unfortunate) will be those on the left!
And (as to) the companions of the left hand; how wretched are the companions of the left hand!
Companions of the Left (O Companions of the Left!)
And (then) those on the left hand; what of those on the left hand?
Those on the Left -- how unlucky are those on the Left!
And those on the left hand; how miserable shall those on the left hand be!
And the People of the Left Hand—and what are the People of the Left Hand?!
And the Companions of the Left Hand,- what will be the Companions of the Left Hand?
And those on the Left Hand (i.e. those who will be given their Record in their left hands), Who will be those on the Left Hand? (As a disgrace for them, because they will enter Hell).
Companions of the Left, what are the Companions of the Left?
And those on the Left—what of those on the Left?
And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?

[56:9] And those of the left [hand] (al-mash’ama means al-shimāl, ‘left’), each of whom is given his record [of deeds] in their left hands — what of those of the left [hand]? — an expression of contempt for their status on account of their admittance into the Fire.

(And (then) those on the left hand) these are the dwellers of the Fire who will be given their scrolls in their left hands; they are the ones about whom Allah said: "These are destined for hell, and I care not"; (what of those on the left hand) again arousing the wonder of His Prophet: and what do you know, Muhammad, about the humiliation, punishment and chastisement suffered by the dwellers of hell?

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَأَصْحَابُ ٱلْمَشْأَمَةِ } أي أصحابُ المَيسرةِ

translations.translation: And the saying of Allah, "And the companions of the Mash'amah" - that is, the companions of the ease.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَأَصْحَابُ ٱلْمَشْأَمَةِ } والشمال
 أي: ملازمو الشآمة والملامة
 وأنواع الندامة والخذلان
 من المفسدين المسرفين
 المصرين على أنواع الكفر والفسوق وأصناف العصيان والآثام من مفاسد العقائد
 ومقابح الشيم والأخلاق { مَآ أَصْحَابُ ٱلْمَشْأَمَةِ } [الواقعة: 9] أي: ما أقبح حالهم أشد عذابهم
 ونكالهم وشآمتهم وشقاوتهم المستمرة عليهم بشؤم مكاسبهم ومفاسدهم
